/usr/local/cuda-10.0/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/gpu_seg.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/gpu_seg.dir/imagem.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/gpu_seg.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib /usr/local/cuda-10.0/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt -lnvgraph -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
